item.title: Welcome to Quartz
item.description: This is a blank Quartz installation. See the documentation for how to get started.

item.title: the fourth note
item.description: is for things I suddenly remember reading or hearing about. Like that plantation mansion building that burnt down the other day.

item.title: third note
item.description: this is the story about the little flakes of tree. I grew up around those trees.

item.title: this is my first note
item.description: it is linked to the second note and I also linked it to the fourth note, where I randomly collect bits and pieces of things I remember reading that astonish me.
